SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM menus m INNER JOIN permissions p ON m.permission_obj_id = p.id INNER JOIN role_permissions rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id INNER JOIN user_roles ur ON rp.role_id = ur.role_id WHERE ur.user_id = #{userId} AND m.enabled = 1 AND m.hidden = 0 ORDER BY m.sort_order

SELECT DISTINCT m.* FROM menus m INNER JOIN permissions p ON m.permission_obj_id = p.id INNER JOIN role_permissions rp ON p.id = rp.permission_id WHERE rp.role_id = #{roleId} AND m.enabled = 1 ORDER BY m.sort_order
